description:
OrderAhead is the most convenient way to order and pay from your phone at local restaurants. Use OrderAhead to save time and discover new local places to order food for pick up or delivery.

Ordering has never been easier:
• Order and pay from your iPhone.
• Order takeout or delivery from the restaurants you love.
• Discover new places to eat.
• Choose a time that fits your schedule.
• Get instant receipts and quickly re-order previous orders.
• 24/7 customer support accessible by phone or email.

How it works:
1. Install the OrderAhead iPhone app. 
2. Add multiple credit cards to simplify personal and business purchases.
3. Browse full menus of local restaurants, create your order, and select a pickup or delivery time.
4. If you order delivery, your food will come directly to you! If you're picking up, just tell the merchant your name and be on your way.

You can currently order ahead from select locations around the nation. Cities include San Francisco, Berkeley, Palo Alto, Redwood City, Mountain View, Menlo Park, Sunnyvale, San Mateo, San Jose, San Carlos, Stanford, Los Angeles, Venice, Santa Monica, Washington D.C., Seattle and Denver.

Don’t see your city or favorite local restaurant? OrderAhead adds new cities and restaurants every week! Let us know where you are & what your favorite takeout restaurants are and we’ll make sure you can order ahead from them! Email requests to requests@orderaheadapp.com.

Interested in becoming an OrderAhead Merchant? Just email merchants@orderaheadapp.com with your business name and contact information.

Stay up to date with the latest OrderAhead news, including newly added restaurants and features
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/OrderAhead
• Facebook: https://facebook.com/orderahead
• Send us feedback: feedback@orderaheadapp.com

No matter where you go or what you’re doing, OrderAhead is always at your fingertips. Place your order ahead of time with the iPhone App or OrderAhead Website (www.orderaheadapp.com)
releaseNotes:
